searchMetadataConfigType.description: Search Source Config Metadata Pipeline type

searchIndexFilterPattern.title: Search Index Filter Pattern
searchIndexFilterPattern.description: Regex to only fetch search indexes that matches the pattern.

markDeletedSearchIndexes.title: Mark Deleted Search Indexes
markDeletedSearchIndexes.description: Optional configuration to soft delete search indexes in OpenMetadata if the source search indexes are deleted. Also, if the search index is deleted, all the associated entities like lineage, etc., with that search index will be deleted

includeSampleData.title: Include Sample Data
includeSampleData.description: Optional configuration to turn off fetching sample data for search index.

sampleSize.title: Sample Size
sampleSize.description: No. of records of sample data we want to ingest.

overrideMetadata.title: Override Metadata
overrideMetadata.description: Set the 'Override Metadata' toggle to control whether to override the existing metadata in the OpenMetadata server with the metadata fetched from the source. If the toggle is set to true, the metadata fetched from the source will override the existing metadata in the OpenMetadata server. If the toggle is set to false, the metadata fetched from the source will not override the existing metadata in the OpenMetadata server. This is applicable for fields like description, tags, owner and displayName

includeIndexTemplate.title: Include Index Template
includeIndexTemplate.description: Enable the 'Include Index Template' toggle to manage the ingestion of index template data.
